title: Full Show (Amari Cooper shines in Browns MNF win, Myles Turner comments on trade to Lakers, LeBron no longer a Cowboys fan?)
description:
00:00 Fans sit courtside at Nets game wearing “fight antisemitism” shirts amid Kyrie backlash
21:36 Amari Cooper has season-high 131 receiving yards and TD in Browns win over Bengals on MNF
53:12 Myles Turner says LA should take a “very hard look” at trading for him
1:03:48 LeBron says he no longer roots for the Cowboys and is a Browns fan
1:14:55 Nets move to 2-5 after beating Pacers 116-109. KD puts up 36 points
1:25:23 Will the Cowboys make a move before the trade deadline?
1:39:24 Ravens trade for Roquan Smith from Bears
1:46:57 Thoughts on JJ Watt paying tribute to Jared Allen’s sack celebration
1:51:20 Kawhi Leonard to miss Clippers upcoming road trip due to knee
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
